item.title: Version 1.0.12+13
item.description:
Release notes - 1.0.12+13

Features:

  • Added floating button at the statistics screen to export data table as a CSV file, while preserving format, amount of rows and columns and sorting order.
  • Added possibility to pause tracking activity for a set period of time.

Fixes:

  • Fixed issue with "Work time" and "Desk time" not calculating correctly.
  • Fixed issue with statistics showing incorrect or no data at all.
  • Fixed multiple issues with applications not having correct names or not showing even with activity being present.
  • Fixed issue with productive time showing over 100% productivity.

item.title: Version 1.0.16+17
item.description:
Release notes - 1.0.16+17

Features:

  • Added playback speed controller to image playback
  • Added "X" to search inquiry to clear field
  • Added hours and minutes symbols to the QTime dashboard

Fixes:

  • Fixed "Download all screenshots" button showing up if there is no screenshots
  • Fixed incorrect date format in calendar
  • Fixed letters getting cut off in statistics table
  • Fixed autostart button not working properly
  • Fixed application not respecting autostart rules
  • Fixed application crashing in sleep mode
